name: authelia
description: Authelia is an authentication and authorization server providing 2FA, SSO, and role-based access for web apps. It integrates with reverse proxies and supports LDAP, OAuth, and self-hosted identity management.
features: Authentication Server: Centralized auth for all your applications. Single sign-on.
Two-Factor Auth: Add 2FA security to any application. Enhanced protection.
SSO Support: Single sign-on across multiple services. One login, many apps.
Reverse Proxy Integration: Works with Traefik, Nginx, and others. Easy integration.
LDAP Support: Connect to existing directory services. Enterprise-ready.
OAuth Integration: Modern authentication protocols supported. Standard compliance.
Role-Based Access: Control who can access what. Granular permissions.
Self-Hosted: Complete control over authentication infrastructure. Security in your hands.
